title: Inquire About Policy Cash Value
description: A whole life policyholder wants to know the current cash value of their policy.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent securely verifies the customer's identity.

tasks.description: Retrieve the current cash value from the policy administration system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully finds the current cash value amount.

tasks.description: Communicate the cash value to the policyholder.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly states the current cash value.
